Test Scenario: Add place with all valid fields
Test Steps:
1. Set endpoint URL
2. Add Content-Type header
3. Add API key as query param
4. Send POST with complete body
5. Verify response
Expected Result: Status: 200, Response contains status=OK, place_id, scope=APP

Test Scenario: Add place with mandatory fields only
Test Steps:
1. Send POST with only location and name
2. Verify response

1. Send POST request without key parameter
2. Verify error response

Test Scenario: Add place with invalid API key
Test Steps:
1. Send POST with invalid key=wrongkey123
2. Verify error response

1. Send POST without location object
2. Verify validation error

1. Send POST without name field
2. Verify validation error

Test Scenario: Add place with empty request body
Test Steps:
1. Send POST with empty JSON {}
2. Verify error

Test Scenario: Add place with invalid JSON syntax
Test Steps:
1. Send malformed JSON
2. Verify parse error

Test Scenario: Add place with wrong HTTP method (GET)
Test Steps:
1. Send GET request to add endpoint
2. Verify method not allowed

1. Set Content-Type: text/plain
2. Send POST request

Test Scenario: Add place with special characters in name
Test Steps:
1. Include special chars in name
2. Verify place created

Test Scenario: Add place with empty name string
Test Steps:
1. Send POST with name as empty string
2. Verify validation

1. Send valid POST request
2. Check response headers

1. Send SQL injection in name field
2. Verify no SQL execution
Expected Result: Status: 200/400, Input sanitized, no SQL execution

Test Scenario: Add place with invalid data type for accuracy
Test Steps:
1. Send accuracy as string instead of number
2. Verify type validation
